OrgName.entry: PLANNING AND PARTNERSHIP - VOLUNTARY ACTION SHEFFIELD

Desc.entry: Aims to promote the involvement of voluntary and community organisations in the development of health, housing and social care services by supporting participation in service planning delivery and organising events eg Health Partnership Network. Supports networks and forums of organisations working with children and young people, older people, learning disability, mental health and supported housing providers. A registered charity.

ContactName.entry: Jane Anslow, Partnership Development Manager/Dave Carr, Interim Planning & Partnership Co-ordinator/Colin Blain/Jasmine Warwick/Sharon Bromley/Planning and Partnership Officers/Pauline Lord, Admin
